content: Hello Jeyachandran, nice to meet you. Thank you for coming in today. Can you tell me a little bit about your background in AI and Machine Learning? What sparked your interest in this field and how do you see it evolving in the future?

I'm glad you're okay with that. So, let's dive a bit deeper into your experience with AI project development. You mentioned that you worked on an AI chatbot project with real-time database integration. Can you walk me through some of the technical details of that project? What specific technologies did you use, and what were some of the key challenges you faced during development?
